00015     LHEParticle::LHEParticle(std::string& line) {
00016 
00017         std::istringstream iss(line);
00018         std::vector<std::string> tokens;
00019         do {
00020             std::string elem;
00021             iss >> elem;
00022             if (elem.size() != 0) {
00023                 tokens.push_back(elem);
00024             }
00025         } while (iss);
00026 
00027         if (tokens.size() != 13) {
00028             std::cerr << "ERROR: Bad particle record in LHE file ..." << std::endl;
00029             std::cerr << "  " << line << std::endl;
00030             G4Exception("LHEParticle::LHEParticle", "LHEParticleError", FatalException, "Wrong number of tokens in LHE particle record.");
00031         }
00032 
00033         idup_ = atof(tokens[0].c_str());
00034         istup_ = atoi(tokens[1].c_str());
00035         mothup_[0] = atoi(tokens[2].c_str());
00036         mothup_[1] = atoi(tokens[3].c_str());
00037         icolup_[0] = atoi(tokens[4].c_str());
00038         icolup_[1] = atoi(tokens[5].c_str());
00039         pup_[0] = atof(tokens[6].c_str());
00040         pup_[1] = atof(tokens[7].c_str());
00041         pup_[2] = atof(tokens[8].c_str());
00042         pup_[3] = atof(tokens[9].c_str());
00043         pup_[4] = atof(tokens[10].c_str());
00044         vtimup_ = atof(tokens[11].c_str());
00045         spinup_ = atof(tokens[12].c_str());
00046 
00047         mothers_[0] = NULL;
00048         mothers_[1] = NULL;
00049     }
00050 
00051     int LHEParticle::getIDUP() const {
00052         return idup_;
00053     }
00054 
00055     int LHEParticle::getISTUP() const {
00056         return istup_;
00057     }
00058

00060         return mothup_[i];
00061     }
00062 
00063     int LHEParticle::getICOLUP(int i) const {
00064         return icolup_[i];
00065     }
00066 
00067     double LHEParticle::getPUP(int i) const {
00068         return pup_[i];
00069     }
00070 
00071     double LHEParticle::getVTIMUP() const {
00072         return vtimup_;
00073     }
00074 
00075     double LHEParticle::getSPINUP() const {
00076         return spinup_;
00077     }
00078 
00079     void LHEParticle::setMother(int i, LHEParticle* mother) {
00080         mothers_[i] = mother;
00081     }
00082 
00083     LHEParticle* LHEParticle::getMother(int i) const {
00084         return mothers_[i];
00085     }
00086 
00087     void LHEParticle::print(std::ostream& stream) const {
00088         stream << "LHEParticle { " << "IDUP: " << getIDUP() << ", ISTUP: " << getISTUP() << ", MOTHUP[0]: " << getMOTHUP(0) << ", MOTHUP[1]: " << getMOTHUP(1) << ", ICOLUP[0]: " << getICOLUP(0) << ", ICOLUP[1]: " << getICOLUP(1) << ", PUP[0]: " << getPUP(0) << ", PUP[1]: " << getPUP(1) << ", PUP[2]: " << getPUP(2) << ", PUP[3]: " << getPUP(3) << ", PUP[4]: " << getPUP(4) << ", VTIMUP: " << getVTIMUP() << ", SPINUP: " << getSPINUP() << " }" << std::endl;
00089     }
00090 
00091     std::ostream& operator <<(std::ostream& stream, const LHEParticle& particle) {
00092         particle.print(stream);
00093         return stream;
00094     }
